title: Sekai Seifuku: Bouryaku no Zvezda - Shin Zvezda Daisakusen
alternative_title: 世界征服～謀略のズヴィズダー～ 新・ズヴィズダー大作戦
description: The unaired 13th episode of Sekai Seifuku: Bouryaku no Zvezda that will be included in Volume 7 of the BD/DVD. In this special, Kate and company will launch their own idol unit, BBK88.
